alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Martin (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 06 at 9:43PM EST until March 11 at 8:12PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River from Seymour through Williams. .Minor flooding is ongoing along the East Fork White river and several tributaries due to 1.5 to 3 inches of rainfall that fell Friday March 3rd. Flooding along the East Fork White River is expected from Seymour to Williams, with the crest through Seymour. Flooding along many smaller tributaries that has not already ended will end by Tuesday. Flooding will continue through the end of the week on the lower portion of the East Fork White River river. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork White River near Rivervale. * WHEN...Until Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, During the late March 2008 flood, the Bedford Times reported the following county roads still under water: River Road, Bartlettsville Road by the bridge and in the bottoms, Judah-Logan Road by the bridge, the gravel part of Logan Bottoms, Donica Church Road between Logan Bottoms and the hill, Peerless Road by Mica Metals, Little Salt Creek Run, Stumphole Bridge Road near SR 450, Huron-Williams Road, Lawrenceport Road, Rivervale Road and Earl Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM EST Monday the stage was 20.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 PM EST Monday was 20.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 24.3 feet Wednesday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
